text: The 2006–07 Football League was the 108th season of The Football League. Sunderland won the championship. == Results == Pos Team Pld W D L F A W D L F A F A GD Pts Notes 1 Sunderland 46 15 4 4 38 18 12 3 8 38 29 76 47 +29 88 Won the league, and moved on to the FA Premier League 2 Birmingham City 46 15 5 3 37 18 11 3 9 30 24 67 42 +25 86 Moved on to the FA Premier League 3 Derby County 46 13 6 4 33 19 12 3 8 29 27 62 46 +16 84 Moved on to the Prmier League playoffs 4 West Bromwich Albion 46 14 4 5 51 24 8 6 9 30 31 81 55 +26 76 Participated in play-offs 5 Wolverhampton Wanderers 46 12 5 6 33 28 10 5 8 26 28 59 56 +3 76 6 Southampton 46 13 6 4 36 20 8 6 9 41 33 77 53 +24 75 7 Preston North End 46 15 4 4 38 17 7 4 12 26 36 64 53 +11 74 8 Stoke City 46 12 8 3 35 16 7 8 8 27 25 62 41 +21 73 9 Sheffield Wednesday 46 10 6 7 38 36 10 5 8 32 30 70 66 +4 71 10 Colchester United 46 15 4 4 46 19 5 5 13 24 37 70 56 +14 69 11 Plymouth Argyle 46 10 8 5 36 26 7 8 8 27 36 63 62 +1 67 12 Crystal Palace 46 12 3 8 33 22 6 8 9 26 29 59 51 +8 65 13 Cardiff City 46 11 7 5 33 18 6 6 11 24 35 57 53 +4 64 14 Ipswich Town 46 13 2 8 40 29 5 6 12 24 30 64 59 +5 62 15 Burnley 46 10 6 7 35 23 5 6 12 17 26 52 49 +3 57 16 Norwich City 46 10 5 8 29 25 6 4 13 27 46 56 71 –15 57 17 Coventry City 46 11 4 8 30 25 5 4 14 17 37 47 62 –15 56 18 Queens Park Rangers 46 9 6 8 31 29 5 5 13 23 39 54 68 –14 53 19 Leicester City 46 6 8 9 26 31 7 6 10 23 33 49 64 –15 53 20 Barnsley 46 9 4 10 27 29 6 1 16 26 56 53 85 –32 50 21 Hull City 46 8 3 12 33 32 5 7 11 18 35 51 67 –16 49 22 Southend United 46 6 6 11 29 38 4 6 13 18 42 47 80 –33 42 Relegated 23 Luton Town 46 7 5 11 33 40 3 5 15 20 41 53 81 –28 40 Relegated 24 Leeds United 46 10 4 9 27 30 3 3 17 19 42 46 72 –26 36 Relegated == Other websites == * The Football League Category:2007 in association football Category:2006 in association football Category:2006 in the United Kingdom Category:2007 in the United Kingdom
